verses.verse: וְדָוִ֥יד <WH1732> So when David זָקֵ֖ן <WH2204> was old וְשָׂבַ֣ע <WH7646> and full יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> of days וַיַּמְלֵ֛ךְ <WH4427> king אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <WH8010> he made Solomon בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel

וַיֶּאֱסֹף֙ <WH622> And he gathered together אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> with the priests וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> and the Levites

וַיִּסָּֽפְרוּ֙ <WH5608> were numbered הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> Now the Levites מִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> from the age שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> of thirty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וָמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> and upward וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> become מִסְפָּרָ֤ם <WH4557> and their number לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָם֙ <WH1538> by their polls לִגְבָרִ֔ים <WH1397> man by man שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> was thirty וּשְׁמוֹנָ֖ה <WH8083> and eight אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

מֵאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> Of which לְנַצֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH5329> [were] to set forward עַל־ <WH5921> and מְלֶ֣אכֶת <WH4399> the work בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and four אָ֑לֶף <WH505> thousand וְשֹׁטְרִ֥ים <WH7860> [were] officers וְשֹׁפְטִ֖ים <WH8199> and judges שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> and six אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> thousand

וְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <WH702> Moreover four אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand שֹׁעֲרִ֑ים <WH7778> [were] porters וְאַרְבַּ֤עַת <WH702> and four אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand מְהַֽלְלִ֣ים <WH1984> praised לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בַּכֵּלִ֕ים <WH3627> with the instruments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֖יתִי <WH6213> which I made לְהַלֵּֽל׃ <WH1984> [said David] to praise

וַיֶּֽחָלְקֵ֥ם <WH2505> divided דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> And David מַחְלְק֑וֹת <WH4256> them into courses ס לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> among the sons לֵוִ֔י <WH3878> of Levi לְגֵרְשׁ֖וֹן <WH1647> Gershom קְהָ֥ת <WH6955> Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> and Merari ס
לַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֖י <WH1649> Of the Gershonites לַעְדָּ֥ן <WH3936> [were] Laadan וְשִׁמְעִֽי׃ <WH8096> and Shimei ס

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons לַעְדָּ֗ן <WH3936> of Laadan הָרֹ֧אשׁ <WH7218> the chief יְחִיאֵ֛ל <WH3171> [was] Jehiel וְזֵתָ֥ם <WH2241> and Zetham וְיוֹאֵ֖ל <WH3100> and Joel שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> three ס

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons שִׁמְעִ֗י <WH8096> of Shimei [שְׁלֹמֹות כ] (שְׁלֹומִ֧ית <WH8013> Shelomith ק) וַחֲזִיאֵ֛ל <WH2381> and Haziel וְהָרָ֖ן <WH2039> and Haran שְׁלֹשָׁ֑ה <WH7969> three אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> These [were] the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לְלַעְדָּֽן׃ <WH3936> of Laadan ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons שִׁמְעִ֔י <WH8096> of Shimei יַ֣חַת <WH3189> [were] Jahath זִינָ֔א <WH2126> Zina וִיע֖וּשׁ <WH3266> and Jeush וּבְרִיעָ֑ה <WH1283> and Beriah אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵי־ <WH1121> [were] the sons שִׁמְעִ֖י <WH8096> of Shimei אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> These four

וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> became יַ֣חַת <WH3189> And Jahath הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> was the chief וְזִיזָ֖ה <WH2125> and Zizah הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <WH8145> the second וִיע֤וּשׁ <WH3266> but Jeush וּבְרִיעָה֙ <WH1283> and Beriah לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הִרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> had not many בָנִ֔ים <WH1121> sons וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> became לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house אָ֔ב <WH1> according to [their] father's לִפְקֻדָּ֖ה <WH6486> reckoning אֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> therefore they were in one ס
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons קְהָ֗ת <WH6955> of Kohath עַמְרָ֥ם <WH6019> Amram יִצְהָ֛ר <WH3324> Izhar חֶבְר֥וֹן <WH2275> Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵ֖ל <WH5816> and Uzziel אַרְבָּעָֽה׃ <WH702> four ס

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons עַמְרָ֖ם <WH6019> of Amram אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> and Moses וַיִּבָּדֵ֣ל <WH914> was separated אַהֲרֹ֡ן <WH175> and Aaron לְֽהַקְדִּישׁוֹ֩ <WH6942> that he should sanctify קֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH6944> the most קָֽדָשִׁ֤ים <WH6944> holy things הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he וּבָנָיו֙ <WH1121> he and his sons עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> ever לְהַקְטִיר֩ <WH6999> to burn incense לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> the LORD לְשָׁרְת֛וֹ <WH8334> to minister וּלְבָרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> unto him and to bless בִּשְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> in his name עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וּמֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Now [concerning] Moses אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God בָּנָ֕יו <WH1121> his sons יִקָּרְא֖וּ <WH7121> were named עַל־ <WH5921> among שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> of the tribe הַלֵּוִֽי׃ <WH3878> of Levi
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses גֵּרְשֹׁ֖ם <WH1647> [were] Gershom וֶאֱלִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <WH461> and Eliezer
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> Of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹם <WH1647> of Gershom שְׁבוּאֵ֥ל <WH7619> Shebuel הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> [was] the chief

וַיִּֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> had בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons אֱלִיעֶ֖זֶר <WH461> of Eliezer רְחַבְיָ֣ה <WH7345> [were] Rehabiah הָרֹ֑אשׁ <WH7218> the chief וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> had לֶאֱלִיעֶ֙זֶר֙ <WH461> And Eliezer בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> sons אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> had none other וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> but the sons רְחַבְיָ֖ה <WH7345> of Rehabiah רָב֥וּ <WH7235> many לְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> were very
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> Of the sons יִצְהָ֖ר <WH3324> of Izhar שְׁלֹמִ֥ית <WH8019> Shelomith הָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> the chief ס

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> Of the sons חֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> of Hebron יְרִיָּ֤הוּ <WH3404> Jeriah הָרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7218> the first אֲמַרְיָ֣ה <WH568> Amariah הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> the second יַחֲזִיאֵל֙ <WH3166> Jahaziel הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> the third וִֽיקַמְעָ֖ם <WH3360> and Jekameam הָרְבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7243> the fourth
בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> Of the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <WH5816> of Uzziel מִיכָ֣ה <WH4318> Michah הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> the first וְיִשִּׁיָּ֖ה <WH3449> and Jesiah הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> the second ס

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> The sons מְרָרִי֙ <WH4847> of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <WH4249> Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֔י <WH4187> and Mushi בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The sons מַחְלִ֖י <WH4249> of Mahli אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> Eleazar וְקִֽישׁ׃ <WH7027> and Kish

וַיָּ֙מָת֙ <WH4191> died אֶלְעָזָ֔ר <WH499> And Eleazar וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יוּ <WH1961> and had ל֛וֹ בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> and had no sons כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> only בָּנ֑וֹת <WH1323> but daughters וַיִּשָּׂא֥וּם <WH5375> took בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the sons קִ֖ישׁ <WH7027> of Kish אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> and their brethren
בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons מוּשִׁ֗י <WH4187> of Mushi מַחְלִ֥י <WH4249> Mahli וְעֵ֛דֶר <WH5740> and Eder וִירֵמ֖וֹת <WH3406> and Jeremoth שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> three

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> These [were] the sons לֵוִי֩ <WH3878> of Levi לְבֵ֨ית <WH1004> after the house אֲבֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <WH1> of their fathers רָאשֵׁ֧י <WH7218> [even] the chief הָאָב֣וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לִפְקוּדֵיהֶ֗ם <WH6485> as they were counted בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <WH4557> by number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <WH8034> of names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <WH1538> by their polls עֹשֵׂה֙ <WH6213> that did הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> the work לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> for the service בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> from the age עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> of twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וָמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> and upward

כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> For David הֵנִ֛יחַ <WH5117> hath given rest יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לְעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> unto his people וַיִּשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> that they may dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem עַד־ <WH5704> for לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> Also לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> And also unto the Levites אֵין־ <WH369> will no לָשֵׂ֧את <WH5375> they shall no [more] carry אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all כֵּלָ֖יו <WH3627> nor any vessels לַעֲבֹדָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5656> of it for the service

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בְדִבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> words דָוִיד֙ <WH1732> of David הָאַ֣חֲרֹנִ֔ים <WH314> For by the last הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like מִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> [were] numbered בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> old לֵוִ֑י <WH3881> the Levites מִבֶּ֛ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וּלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> and above

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מַעֲמָדָ֞ם <WH4612> Because their office לְיַד־ <WH3027> [was] to wait בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> on the sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> of Aaron לַעֲבֹדַת֙ <WH5656> for the service בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> in הַחֲצֵרוֹת֙ <WH2691> in the courts וְעַל־ <WH5921> and in הַלְּשָׁכ֔וֹת <WH3957> and in the chambers וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> and in טָהֳרַ֖ת <WH2893> and in the purifying לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of all holy things וּמַֽעֲשֵׂ֔ה <WH4639> and the work עֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> of the service בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וּלְלֶ֨חֶם <WH3899> bread הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֜כֶת <WH4635> row וּלְסֹ֤לֶת <WH5560> and for the fine flour לְמִנְחָה֙ <WH4503> for meat offering וְלִרְקִיקֵ֣י <WH7550> cakes הַמַּצּ֔וֹת <WH4682> and for the unleavened וְלַֽמַּחֲבַ֖ת <WH4227> and for [that which is baked in] the pan וְלַמֻּרְבָּ֑כֶת <WH7246> and for that which is fried וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all מְשׂוּרָ֖ה <WH4884> and for all manner of measure וּמִדָּֽה׃ <WH4060> and size

וְלַעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> And to stand בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> every morning בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> morning לְהֹד֥וֹת <WH3034> to thank וּלְהַלֵּ֖ל <WH1984> and praise לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְכֵ֖ן <WH3651> and likewise לָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> and likewise at even

וּלְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> all הַעֲל֤וֹת <WH5927> And to offer עֹלוֹת֙ <WH5930> all burnt sacrifices לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לַשַּׁבָּת֔וֹת <WH7676> in the sabbaths לֶחֳדָשִׁ֖ים <WH2320> in the new moons וְלַמֹּעֲדִ֑ים <WH4150> and on the set feasts בְּמִסְפָּ֨ר <WH4557> by number כְּמִשְׁפָּ֧ט <WH4941> according to the order עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> concerning תָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> commanded unto them continually לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְשָׁמְר֞וּ <WH8104> And that they should keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> the charge אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֗ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> and the charge הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the holy וּמִשְׁמֶ֕רֶת <WH4931> [place] and the charge בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron אֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <WH251> their brethren לַעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> in the service בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ
